extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ENPH 252 (or PHYS 252), Corequisites: ENPH 211, ENPH 225, ENPH 239

basic.description: The demonstration of the basic techniques of the engineering physicist in the measurement of electric, magnetic and mechanical properties. The emphasis is on correct measurement techniques, error analysis, treatment of results and the presentation of data.
basic.subject: ENPH
basic.title: Engineering Physics Laboratory
